loot_table.name: Afanc
loot_table.description: A mythical creature often depicted as a demon crocodile.

loot_table.name: Ascallion
loot_table.description: A fierce sea creature, known for its hard shell and sharp teeth.

loot_table.name: Barbfish
loot_table.description: A species of freshwater bottom-feeder shark from Amn.

loot_table.name: Bichir
loot_table.description: A species of fish known for its elongated body and large scales.

loot_table.name: Black Burner
loot_table.description: A fiery fish emitting dark smoke, usually found in volcanic underwater vents.

loot_table.name: Bloatfish
loot_table.description: A fish that inflates its body when threatened.

loot_table.name: Brownfin
loot_table.description: A species of freshwater fish found in Cormyr and the King's Forest.

loot_table.name: Giant Catfish
loot_table.description: A larger version of the common catfish, often found in deep rivers.

loot_table.name: Stalking Catfish
loot_table.description: A silent hunter of the underwater world, known for its stealth.

loot_table.name: Crystal Nipper
loot_table.description: A small, translucent fish known for its powerful bite.

loot_table.name: Dunchow
loot_table.description: A delicacy in Amn only found in Lake Esmel.

loot_table.name: Icetail
loot_table.description: A fish adapted to cold environments, with a tail resembling a shard of ice.

loot_table.name: Jewelfish
loot_table.description: A beautifully colored fish prized by collectors.

loot_table.name: Hetfish
loot_table.description: Swarming fish known for their super-heated bodies that turn water into steam.

loot_table.name: Hogfish
loot_table.description: A species of fish found in Akanamere, often dried and stocked in pantries of the city-state of Sumbria.

loot_table.name: Manyfin
loot_table.description: A fish with an unusually large number of fins, creating a unique silhouette in the water.

loot_table.name: Pike
loot_table.description: A species of big and energetic freshwater predators.

loot_table.name: Northern Pike
loot_table.description: A species of big and energetic cold brackish water-dwelling cousins from the Sea of Moving Ice.

loot_table.name: Piranha
loot_table.description: Small schooling predators that go into blood frenzy and swarm their prey.

loot_table.name: Pyrimo
loot_table.description: A fish species that is well-adapted to high-temperature environments.

loot_table.name: Quippers
loot_table.description: Small, carnivorous fish, often moving in large schools.

loot_table.name: Greater Raik
loot_table.description: Species of aggressive fish with hooked jaws found in the waters of Sea of Fallen Stars.

loot_table.name: Lesser Raik
loot_table.description: Smaller subspecies of Raiks, equally aggressive but not as threatening.

loot_table.name: S'repic
loot_table.description: A flesh-eating fish from the Malatran Plateau with huge silver scales.

loot_table.name: Salmon
loot_table.description: A common fish species, well-regarded for its taste.

loot_table.name: Sardine
loot_table.description: Small silver fish often found in large schools.

loot_table.name: Silverling
loot_table.description: Small, silver-colored fish that are quite common in rivers and lakes.

loot_table.name: Singing Fish
loot_table.description: Fancifully-cooked festival fish from the Blade Kingdoms, caught in the waters of Akanamere.

loot_table.name: Shark
loot_table.description: Predatory sea creatures, known for their strength and aggressive nature.

loot_table.name: Giant Shark
loot_table.description: Huge, highly dangerous predators of the open sea.

loot_table.name: Spiny Sleeper
loot_table.description: A nocturnal fish that has sharp spines along its body.

loot_table.name: Steelhead
loot_table.description: A variant of the trout, known for its hard head and strong bite.

loot_table.name: Sunfish
loot_table.description: Several species of fresh and saltwater fish known for their flat, round bodies.

loot_table.name: Knucklehead Trout
loot_table.description: A variant of trout with a distinctive 'knuckle'-like head shape.

loot_table.name: Szorp Trout
loot_table.description: A rare trout species, known for its poisonous spines.

loot_table.name: Verme
loot_table.description: A small, colorful fish found in coral reefs.

loot_table.name: Abyssal Angler
loot_table.description: A deep-sea fish known for its luminescent lure.

loot_table.name: Barracuda
loot_table.description: A fast and aggressive predator of warm oceans.

loot_table.name: Bluetail
loot_table.description: A vibrant freshwater fish, popular in the aquarium trade.

loot_table.name: Cave Carp
loot_table.description: A blind fish found in subterranean water bodies.

loot_table.name: Devil Ray
loot_table.description: A large flat fish known for its long tail.

loot_table.name: Eel
loot_table.description: A long, snake-like fish that can deliver an electric shock.

loot_table.name: Frostfin
loot_table.description: A fish adapted to the coldest seas, it's scales shimmer with frost.

loot_table.name: Giant Squid
loot_table.description: A massive sea creature with a powerful beak.

loot_table.name: Halibut
loot_table.description: A flat fish found on the ocean floor.

loot_table.name: Iridescent Icht
loot_table.description: A fish with scales that reflect light in a dazzling array of colors.

loot_table.name: Jade Jawfish
loot_table.description: A green-scaled fish known for its strong jaw.

loot_table.name: Kraken
loot_table.description: An enormous, legendary sea creature feared by sailors.

loot_table.name: Leviathan
loot_table.description: A massive, ancient sea creature of myth and legend.

loot_table.name: Manta Ray
loot_table.description: A graceful swimmer known for its large pectoral fins.

loot_table.name: Narwhal
loot_table.description: A whale-like creature known for its long, spiral horn.

loot_table.name: Octopus
loot_table.description: A clever sea creature with eight tentacles.

loot_table.name: Pearl Perch
loot_table.description: A fish known for the pearl-like shine of its scales.

loot_table.name: Quillfish
loot_table.description: A small fish covered in sharp quills.

loot_table.name: Rainbow Trout
loot_table.description: A trout with multi-colored scales.

loot_table.name: Sea Serpent
loot_table.description: A massive, legendary creature of the sea.

loot_table.name: Tiger Shark
loot_table.description: A large, dangerous shark known for its striped skin.

loot_table.name: Unicorn Fish
loot_table.description: A tropical fish known for the horn-like protrusion on its head.

loot_table.name: Viperfish
loot_table.description: A deep-sea fish known for its long, fang-like teeth.

loot_table.name: Whale
loot_table.description: A massive creature known for its songs that can be heard over great distances.

loot_table.name: Xiphias
loot_table.description: Also known as swordfish, recognized by its pointed bill.

loot_table.name: Yellowfin Tuna
loot_table.description: A fast-swimming fish known for its yellow fins and high speed.

loot_table.name: Zebra Fish
loot_table.description: A small freshwater fish with striking black and white stripes.

loot_table.name: Dragonfish
loot_table.description: A rare, mythical creature of the sea with draconic features.

loot_table.name: Oarfish
loot_table.description: A long, ribbon-like fish that is rarely seen.

loot_table.name: Glassfish
loot_table.description: A small fish with a semi-transparent body.

loot_table.name: Moonfish
loot_table.description: A round, silvery fish that glows softly in the moonlight.

loot_table.name: Starfish
loot_table.description: A slow-moving, five-pointed creature.

loot_table.name: Hammerhead Shark
loot_table.description: A large shark known for its distinctive, hammer-shaped head.

loot_table.name: Anchovy
loot_table.description: A small, oily fish often found in large schools.

loot_table.name: Dolphin
loot_table.description: A highly intelligent aquatic mammal known for its playful behavior.

loot_table.name: Lobster
loot_table.description: A large sea creature with a hard shell and strong pincers.

loot_table.name: Jellyfish
loot_table.description: A soft-bodied sea creature that can sting its prey.

loot_table.name: Stingray
loot_table.description: A flat, diamond-shaped creature known for its long, venomous tail.

loot_table.name: Turtle
loot_table.description: A hard-shelled sea creature that lives a long life.

loot_table.name: Swordfish
loot_table.description: A fast, agile predator known for its long, sharp bill.

loot_table.name: Clownfish
loot_table.description: A brightly colored fish often found among sea anemones.

loot_table.name: Pufferfish
loot_table.description: A fish that can inflate its body into a round ball when threatened.

loot_table.name: Old boot
loot_table.description: It's falling apart and still smells.

loot_table.name: Rusty Can
loot_table.description: An old, rusted can with no label.

loot_table.name: Tattered Cap
loot_table.description: An old cap with a ripped peak.

loot_table.name: Cracked Bottle
loot_table.description: A bottle with a large crack running down its side.

loot_table.name: Rotten Plank
loot_table.description: A piece of wood, rotten and full of wormholes.

loot_table.name: Broken Compass
loot_table.description: A compass with a shattered glass and a jammed needle.

loot_table.name: Busted Lantern
loot_table.description: An old lantern. The glass is shattered and it's full of water.

loot_table.name: Deflated Float
loot_table.description: A pool float with a big tear. It's no longer useful.

loot_table.name: Damaged Net
loot_table.description: A fishing net with big holes and torn edges.

loot_table.name: Dilapidated Crate
loot_table.description: An old wooden crate. It's falling apart.

loot_table.name: Discarded Plastic Bag
loot_table.description: A plastic bag, torn and floating aimlessly.

loot_table.name: Dented Canister
loot_table.description: An old canister with a huge dent and no lid.

loot_table.name: Soggy Cardboard
loot_table.description: A piece of cardboard that has turned into a soggy mess.

loot_table.name: Broken Paddle
loot_table.description: Half of a wooden paddle. The other half is nowhere to be seen.

loot_table.name: Old Rag
loot_table.description: A piece of cloth, dirty and frayed at the edges.

loot_table.name: Burnt Book
loot_table.description: A book with burnt and water-damaged pages. Its content is lost forever.

loot_table.name: Rusty Hook
loot_table.description: An old, rusted hook without a line.

loot_table.name: Leaky Bucket
loot_table.description: A bucket with a hole at the bottom. It's useless.

loot_table.name: Abyssal Angler
loot_table.description: This rare, monstrous fish from the depths of the Underdark uses a luminous lure to attract prey into its gaping maw, filled with needle-like teeth. Its flesh is said to imbue the eater with temporary darkvision.

loot_table.name: Shadowfin Leaper
loot_table.description: An elusive fish that swims in the currents of the Shadowfell. Its black, shimmering scales absorb light, making it almost invisible in dark waters. Consuming it is rumored to grant brief etherealness, allowing one to phase through physical barriers.

loot_table.name: Eldritch Eel
loot_table.description: A serpentine creature from the Far Realm, its flesh pulses with eerie bioluminescence. Consuming it might bestow temporary telepathic abilities, but risks psychic trauma.

loot_table.name: Phantom Flatfish
loot_table.description: This flat, disc-shaped fish hails from the ethereal plane. It flickers in and out of visibility in the material world.
